title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 10, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 10, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Game Engine Dev
items.content_text:
### Game Engines / Popular

*   ğŸ‰ [Godot (â­99k)](https://github.com/godotengine/godot#readme) ğŸ”¥ - Feature-packed, open source engine. Excellent! \[[Awesome (â­8.2k)](https://github.com/godotengine/awesome-godot#readme) | [Website](https://godotengine.org)]

### Game Engines / AAA

*   ğŸ‰ [Amazon Lumberyard (â­2.1k)](https://github.com/aws/lumberyard) - AAA engine integrated with AWS and Twitch. Forked from *CRYENGINE*.
*   ğŸ’¸ [CRYENGINE](https://www.cryengine.com) - Powerful real-time game development platform by *Crytek*.
*   ğŸ†“ [Evergine](https://evergine.com) - High-quality 3D and 2D solutions. Formerly *Wave Engine*. \[[Samples (â­130)](https://github.com/EvergineTeam/Samples)]
*   ğŸ‰ [O3DE (â­8.4k)](https://github.com/o3de/o3de/) - Multi-platform AAA engine. Cinema-quality 3D. Successor to *Lumberyard*.

### Game Engines / Commercial

*   ğŸ’° [AppGameKit](https://www.appgamekit.com/studio) - Easy and quick game making by *TheGameCreators*.
*   ğŸ’° [Corgi Engine](https://corgi-engine.moremountains.com/) - 2D/2.5D platformer engine built on top of *Unity*.
*   ğŸ‰ [Defold (â­5.3k)](https://github.com/defold/defold) - Open sourced game engine by *King*. \[[Website](https://defold.com)]
*   ğŸ’¸ [Felgo](https://felgo.com/games) - Build cross-platform 2D games in days, built with *Qt*.
*   ğŸ’° [GameGuru](https://www.game-guru.com/) - Game builder, 3D, no coding required by *TheGameCreators*.
*   ğŸ’¸ [GameMaker Studio](https://www.yoyogames.com/en/gamemaker) - Popular 2D game development environment by *YoYo Games*.
*   ğŸ’° [Phaser Editor 2D](https://phasereditor2d.com) - Commercial, web-based editor for *Phaser*. \[[GitHub (â­467)](https://github.com/PhaserEditor2D/PhaserEditor2D-v3)]

### Game Engines / Specialty

*   ğŸ’° [3dSen](https://geod.itch.io/3dnes) - Emulator that lets you play *NES* games in 3D. \[[Website](http://www.geodstudio.net)]
*   ğŸ‰ [GB Studio (â­8.9k)](https://github.com/chrismaltby/gb-studio) - Retro adventure game creator for *Game Boy*.
*   ğŸ’° [Platforming Engine](https://robvansaaze.itch.io/platforming-engine) - Everything you need to create your own platformer in *GameMaker*.
*   ğŸ’° [RPG in a Box](https://www.rpginabox.com) - Turn your stories and ideas into games, built with *Godot*.

### Learning / Computer Graphics

*   Platform: XNA
    *   ğŸ“š [RB Whitaker's Wiki](http://rbwhitaker.wikidot.com/) - Tutorials on C#, MonoGame, XNA, and more.
    *   ğŸ“š [Riemer's MonoGame Tutorials (â­765)](https://github.com/SimonDarksideJ/XNAGameStudio/wiki/RiemersArchiveOverview) - Everything you need to start programming with MonoGame.
    *   ğŸ“š [XNA Game Studio Archive (â­765)](https://github.com/SimonDarksideJ/XNAGameStudio) ğŸ”¥ - Required visit for [MonoGame](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MonoGame) / [FNA](https://fna-xna.github.io/) / [XNA](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microsoft_XNA) developers.

### Libraries / BASIC

*   BASIC: App Framework
    *   ğŸ’° [Basic for Qt](https://www.q7basic.org/index.html) - BASIC language and environment built with *Qt*. Formerly *Q7Basic*.
    *   ğŸ‰ [QB64 (â­688)](https://github.com/QB64Team/qb64) - Modern BASIC+OpenGL language, retains *QBasic* / *QB4.5* compatibility.
    *   ğŸ“š [Visual Basic](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/visual-basic/) - Object-oriented language for Windows by *Microsoft*.

### Libraries / C

*   C: App Framework
    *   ğŸ‰ [glfw (â­14k)](https://github.com/glfw/glfw) - Cross-platform API for windowing, graphics contexts, input and events.
    *   ğŸ‰ [MiniFB (â­1.1k)](https://github.com/emoon/minifb) - Creates a cross-platform frame buffer for drawing pixels.
    *   ğŸ‰ [SDL (â­13k)](https://github.com/libsdl-org/SDL) ğŸ”¥ - Low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse, joystick, and graphics hardware.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Sokol (â­8.4k)](https://github.com/floooh/sokol) ğŸ”¥ - Single-file libraries for graphics, windowing, file handling, audio and more.
*   C: Audio
    *   â­ [Miniaudio (â­4.8k)](https://github.com/mackron/miniaudio) - Single-file audio playback and capture library.
    *   ğŸ‰ [SDL\_mixer (â­532)](https://github.com/libsdl-org/SDL_mixer) - Audio mixer that supports various file formats for SDL.
    *   ğŸ‰ [SoLoud (â­2k)](https://github.com/jarikomppa/soloud) ğŸ”¥ - Free, easy, portable audio engine for games.
*   C: Game Framework
    *   ğŸ‰ [CGL (â­441)](https://github.com/Jaysmito101/cgl) - Single-header file, lots of graphics & utility functions.
    *   ğŸ‰ [DOME (â­482)](https://github.com/domeengine/dome) - Melds SDL2 and the Wren scripting language. \[[Website](https://domeengine.com/)]
    *   ğŸ‰ [Entrypoint (â­71)](https://github.com/jimon/entrypoint) - Lightweight entry point for games.
    *   â­ [FWK (â­517)](https://github.com/r-lyeh/FWK) - 3D game framework.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Gunslinger (â­1.4k)](https://github.com/MrFrenik/gunslinger) - Header-only C99 framework for multimedia apps.
    *   ğŸ‰ [RayLib (â­27k)](https://github.com/raysan5/raylib) ğŸ”¥ - Simple and easy-to-use library to enjoy 2D/3D videogame programming.
*   C: Libraries
    *   â­ [Cute Headers (â­4.7k)](https://github.com/RandyGaul/cute_headers) - Single-file libraries primarily used for games, by [Randy Gaul](https://github.com/RandyGaul).
    *   â­ [Libs (â­1.9k)](https://github.com/mattiasgustavsson/libs) - Single-file public domain libraries for C/C++, by [Mattias Gustavsson](https://github.com/mattiasgustavsson).
    *   â­ [Pico Headers (â­383)](https://github.com/empyreanx/pico_headers) - Single-file, cross-platform libraries for game development.
    *   ğŸ“š [Single-file Libs (â­9.4k)](https://github.com/nothings/single_file_libs) - Amazing collection of single-file C/C++ libraries compiled from many authors.
    *   â­ [stb (â­29k)](https://github.com/nothings/stb) ğŸ”¥ - Single-file public domain libraries for C/C++, by [Sean Barrett](https://github.com/nothings).

### Libraries / C++

*   ğŸ“š [Learn C++](https://www.learncpp.com) ğŸ”¥ - Walks you through all the steps to write, compile, and debug C++.
*   C++: App Framework
    *   ğŸ‰ [Cinder (â­5.4k)](https://github.com/cinder/Cinder) - App / graphics library for macOS, Windows, Linux, iOS. \[[Website](https://libcinder.org)]
    *   ğŸ‰ [Cross Window (â­686)](https://github.com/alaingalvan/CrossWindow) - Platform library for managing windows and other OS tasks.
    *   ğŸ‰ [SFML (â­11k)](https://github.com/SFML/SFML) ğŸ”¥ - Cross-platform access to windowing, graphics, audio and networking.
*   C++: Layout
    *   ğŸ‰ [Yoga (â­18k)](https://github.com/facebook/yoga) - Cross-platform [flexbox](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_Flexible_Box_Layout/Basic_Concepts_of_Flexbox) layout engine by *Facebook*. \[[Website](https://yogalayout.com/)]
*   C++: Scripting
    *   ğŸ‰ [AngelScript](http://www.angelcode.com/angelscript/) - Cross-platform scripting library, follows the widely known syntax of C/C++.
    *   ğŸ”’ [ArkScript (â­648)](https://github.com/ArkScript-lang/Ark) - Small, fast, functional and scripting language.
    *   ğŸ‰ [ChaiScript (â­3k)](https://github.com/ChaiScript/ChaiScript) - Embedded scripting language designed from to directly target C++17.
    *   ğŸ‰ [GameMonkey Script (â­154)](https://github.com/publicrepo/gmscript) - Embedded scripting language for apps, tools and games.
    *   ğŸ‰ [v8 (â­24k)](https://github.com/v8/v8) - High-performance JavaScript and WebAssembly engine by *Google*.

### Libraries / C#

*   C#: Game Framework
    *   ğŸ‰ [FNA (â­2.8k)](https://github.com/FNA-XNA/FNA) - Reimplementation of the Microsoft XNA Game Studio 4.0 libraries.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Monofoxe (â­435)](https://github.com/Martenfur/Monofoxe) - Game engine designed to simplify working with *MonoGame*.
    *   ğŸ‰ [MonoGame (â­12k)](https://github.com/MonoGame/MonoGame) ğŸ”¥ - Framework for creating cross-platform games. \[[Website](https://www.monogame.net/)]
    *   ğŸ‰ [Nez (â­1.9k)](https://github.com/prime31/Nez) - Feature-rich 2D framework built on *MonoGame*.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Protogame (â­180)](https://github.com/RedpointGames/Protogame) - Cross-platform 2D/3D game engine built on *MonoGame*.
*   C#: Physics
    *   ğŸ‰ [Aether Physics (â­378)](https://github.com/tainicom/Aether.Physics2D) - 2D physics library with continuous collision detection.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Box2D.NET (â­58)](https://github.com/ikpil/Box2D.NET) - C# port of Box2D. 2D physics engine for games, .NET C#, Unity3D, servers.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Velcro Physics (â­705)](https://github.com/Genbox/VelcroPhysics) - C# port of Box2D. Formerly *Farseer Physics*.

### Libraries / Dart

*   Dart: App Framework
    *   ğŸ‰ [Flutter](https://flutter.dev) - Open source app framework by *Google*. \[[Awesome (â­56k)](https://github.com/Solido/awesome-flutter) | [GitHub](https://github.com/flutter)]

### Libraries / Haxe

*   Haxe: Gui
    *   ğŸ‰ [HaxeUI (â­366)](https://github.com/haxeui/haxeui-core) - Cross-platform set of styleable gui components.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Zui (â­318)](https://github.com/armory3d/zui) - Immediate mode user interface, used in *ArmorPaint*.

### Libraries / JavaScript

*   JavaScript: Game Framework
    *   ğŸ‰ [Crafty (â­3.5k)](https://github.com/craftyjs/Crafty) - Create 2D games in a structured way.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Excalibur (â­2k)](https://github.com/excaliburjs/Excalibur) - Friendly TypeScript 2D game engine for the web.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Galacean (â­5k)](https://github.com/galacean/engine) - Web/Mobile-first engine built on WebGL and glTF.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Kaboom (â­2.7k)](https://github.com/replit/kaboom) - Simple 2D framework.
    *   ğŸ‰ [LittleJS (â­3.7k)](https://github.com/KilledByAPixel/LittleJS) - Lightweight 2D framework with WebGL rendering.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Meep (â­276)](https://github.com/Usnul/meep) - ECS game framework.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Oasis (â­5k)](https://github.com/ant-galaxy/oasis-engine) - WebGL framework by *AntGroup*. 2D/3D, animation, physics.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Phaser (â­38k)](https://github.com/photonstorm/phaser) - Fast 2D game framework. \[[Website](https://phaser.io)]
    *   ğŸ‰ [Turbulenz (â­4.7k)](https://github.com/turbulenz/turbulenz_engine) - Modular 2D/3D game framework for browsers, desktops and mobile.
    *   ğŸ‰ [WhitestormJS (â­6.2k)](https://github.com/WhitestormJS/whs.js) - Framework for 3D apps / games, built on *Three.js*.

### Libraries / Ruby

*   Ruby: Graphics - 3D
    *   ğŸ‰ [Mittsu (â­535)](https://github.com/danini-the-panini/mittsu) - 3D graphics library based heavily on *Three.js*.

### Libraries / Rust

*   Rust: Game Engine w/Editor
    *   ğŸ‰ [Fyrox (â­8.4k)](https://github.com/FyroxEngine/Fyrox) - 2D/3D game engine with editor. Formerly *Rg3d*. \[[Website](https://fyrox.rs/)]
*   Rust: Gui
    *   ğŸ”’ [Azul (â­6k)](https://github.com/fschutt/azul) - Desktop gui framework.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Dioxus (â­29k)](https://github.com/dioxuslabs/dioxus) - Cross-platform, React-like gui library.
    *   ğŸ‰ [Druid (â­9.7k)](https://github.com/linebender/druid) - Data-first gui design toolkit.
    *   ğŸ‰ [egui (â­26k)](https://github.com/emilk/egui) - Easy to use immediate mode gui. Runs on web and native. \[[Demo](https://www.egui.rs/)]
    *   ğŸ”’ [Slint (â­20k)](https://github.com/slint-ui/slint) - Gui toolkit for embedded / desktop. Formerly *SixtyFPS*. \[[Website](https://slint-ui.com/)]

### Open Source Games / C

*   ğŸ”’ [Doom (â­17k)](https://github.com/id-Software/DOOM) - The original 1993 3D masterpiece by *id Software*.

### Open Source Games / C++

*   ğŸ‰ [Etheral Legends (â­245)](https://github.com/Soverance/EtherealLegends) - Indie Action RPG built with *Unreal Engine 4*. \[[Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/428980/Ethereal_Legends/)]

### Specialty Topics / Lighting / Shadows

*   Lighting 3D
    *   ğŸ“š [Basic Lighting](https://learnopengl.com/Lighting/Basic-Lighting) - 3D lighting article by *LearnOpenGL*.
    *   ğŸ“š [Forward Rendering vs. Deferred Rendering](https://gamedevelopment.tutsplus.com/articles/forward-rendering-vs-deferred-rendering--gamedev-12342) - Techniques for handling many lights.
    *   ğŸ“š [Forward+ Rendering / Tiled Forward Shading](https://www.3dgep.com/forward-plus/) - Forward rendering with tiled light culling.

### Specialty Topics / Physics

*   ğŸ“š [Fix Your Timestep!](https://gafferongames.com/post/fix_your_timestep/) ğŸ”¥ - How to keep physics stable with variable fps.

### Specialty Topics / Shaders

*   ğŸ“š [3D Game Shaders For Beginners](https://lettier.github.io/3d-game-shaders-for-beginners/index.html) ğŸ”¥ - Shaders to improve your games. \[[Source (â­19k)](https://github.com/lettier/3d-game-shaders-for-beginners)]
*   ğŸ“š [Book of Shaders](https://thebookofshaders.com) ğŸ”¥ - Step-by-step guide through [Fragment Shaders](https://www.khronos.org/opengl/wiki/Fragment_Shader). \[[Source (â­6.4k)](https://github.com/patriciogonzalezvivo/thebookofshaders)]

### Tools / Software / Animation Software

*   ğŸ’¸ [Mixamo](https://www.mixamo.com/#/) - Animate 3D characters for games, films and more. By *Adobe*.

### Tools / Software / Modeling Tools

*   ğŸ†“ [Blender](https://www.blender.org) ğŸ”¥ - Standard for open source 3D modeling. \[[Source (â­16k)](https://github.com/blender/blender)]

### Video Game Assets / Graphic Assets

*   ğŸ†“ [Kenny](https://www.kenney.nl/assets) ğŸ”¥ - 2D/3D CC0 1.0 game graphics and other assets.
